CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "The Know How! - Phil Taylor, head of the Courier Engraving Department, demonstrated to a group of University of Pittsburgh journalism students the 'know how' of making cuts for pictures. The group toured the Courier plant last Thursday, and were much impressed by The World's Best Weekly. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Phil Taylor holding newspaper layout board, to group of University of Pittsburgh journalism students, in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper printing plant
